channel.title: Summonscape - 317 - PI
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've played runescape for over 5 years and i spend the last 3 years playing on my summoning tank. I enjoyed this type of account the most but now the eoc is here summtanks are ruined. My idea is to create a server based mainly on summoning.
Some Ideas: Add Troll invasion minigame. Add a new and better summoning system. Make the training slow so you achieved really something when u get 99 and not just 1 hour of playing... Add some good charms dropping npcs like waterfiends giant rock crabs and ofcoure the rock lobsters. Also make it more efficient to make a low level pure (D Bow pure, Mage pure) so there will be alot of low level pkers.
Things i already added: Fixed the iron titan pouch, it summons the iron titan perfect now. Need scrolls for the special attack of a familiar. ::charms (area full of waterfiends which have a 75% drop rate for crimson charms.
I was thinking of a project i could make which isnt really already there. Now the eoc is here summtanks are ruined and on the 07 servers there isn't summoning. And since summoning is on the most servers the same i wanted to create a new summonming system and make it a very important thing of my server.
I use the source deathlypvpz3 (pi) also if someone wants to join me in my project, i would love that.
adding some pictures soon. Want to make some pictures of things that really worth making a pic of it. I hope u like my new project so far :)

item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

If your just programming a PI for summoning, it wouldn’t really matter what based you used. You should try a close to blank one so we see your work and not shitty deathlypvp.
though, many people have done those before but good luck.

Hey guys,
I’ve played runescape for over 5 years and i spend the last 3 years playing on my summoning tank.
I enjoyed this type of account the most but now the eoc is here summtanks are ruined.
My idea is to create a server based mainly on summoning.
